duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle repairs, maintenance, installation and troubleshooting of industrial equipment, systems, and components.
Assist other maintenance personnel with emergency and non-emergency repairs.
Troubleshoot and repair Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC’s) and associated control systems.
Perform boiler chemical and wastewater pre-treatment system testing and make necessary chemical adjustments as required.
Inspect, clean and lubricate shafts, bearings, gears, and other equipment parts.
Utilize a Computerized Maintenance Management System.
Perform other duties as assigned by leadership.

education_certification.credential: High school and/or GED is preferred. Two-year technical degree in an appropriate background is preferred.
